name: Carbone4
membership: We are part of Finance for Tomorrow.
goal: Carbone 4 is a consulting firm dedicated to the low carbon transition. We perform carbon footprint analyses and identify risks and opportunities linked to energy and climate matters for our clients
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives: We follow the sustainable finance topics, work of the HLEG on sustainable finance and the Commission action plan on financing sustainable growth.
